ovdesc.p: Concat file to link DX.TRANSACTION records which have the same strategy ID.
Shows all transactions hedged against this strategy ID.

desc.p: Strategy Link reference as held against "LINK" field in the DX.TRANSACTION record(s) and against the "PRI.LINK" or "SEC.LINK" fields in DX.TRADE or DX.ORDER.
Key to the DX.TRANSACTION records which share this Strategy Link Reference
